alert.note: Alert for Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 4:23AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lost River Valley/Range and Challis/Pahsimeroi Valleys, including but not limited to Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, Borah Peak, and Challis. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
